job_description:
• PhD or Masters in chemistry, biochemistry, computer science, physics or related fields with a minimum of 2 year’s post-graduate experience Experience with macromolecular modeling is required.
• Experience in modeling protein:nucleic acid complexes is desired.
• Experience with interfacing with, curating, and extracting information from sequence/protein databases is highly desired Strong data analysis skills.
• Scripting in Python and/or R is strongly desired Demonstrated wet lab experience and design in molecular cloning, protein expression/purification, and developing/executing analytical and functional assays to rigorously test design hypotheses Demonstrated track record in using directed evolution or rational design to enhance function and solve complex biological problems, with a broad understanding of protein design applications in genomics is highly desired Excellent communication and organizational skills to manage multidisciplinary projects Desire to build game-changing technologies and impact the world of life science research Process ScientistSingapore OfficeOperationsPosted 3 months agoSr.
• Proven proficiency in key computational tools, including AlphaFold (structure prediction), ProteinMPNN and RFdiffusion (inverse/de novo design), PyMOL and Foldseek (structural analysis).

• Experience with network and routing protocols – Ethernet, TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF, IPsec VPN, Zero-trust model.
• Experience with using protocol analysis tools such as wireshark.
• Experience with network automation.
• Experience building and managing networking elements within major cloud providers (AWS, MS Azure, GCP).
• Experience building HA infrastructure by utilizing clustering, load balancing, and other technologies.
• Working experience managing Palo Alto firewalls with Panorama and IAC.
• Experience managing DNS, DHCP, and IPAM solutions from different vendors (Efficient IP, Cloudflare, MS DNS).
• Experience in IP telephony and multi-campus video conferencing solutions.

• Exceptional Communication: Must be able to clearly articulate complex technical problems and solutions to both highly technical and non-technical users (verbal and written).
• 3 years of hands-on IT Support/system administration experience 3 years supporting and provisioning Windows and macOS devices Experience supporting a large SaaS environment (Okta, Google Workspace, Zoom, Slack, Kandji, Intune, etc) Experience administering Okta, Zoom, and/or Google Workspace Experience with A/V support (ie.
• Provide day to day technical support to users (onsite and remote), assisting them with their workstations, laptops, productivity software, and audio/visual systems.
• Provide white-glove support for our executive leadership when necessary Provide A/V support for our conference rooms and webinars Manage incident lifecycle through our ticketing systems (Asana/ServiceNow), ensuring accurate documentation, timely communication, and adherence to SLAs.
• Conduct hardware diagnostics, repair, and replacement for desktop computers, laptops, and peripherals.
• Collaborate with other teams to provide technical and customer support Deploy, configure, and maintain standardized corporate images and software packages using MDM tools (Microsoft Intune, Kandji).
• Develop and maintain clear, up-to-date documentation (Knowledge Base articles, process guides) for complex troubleshooting procedures.
• Customer Focus and Empathy: Proven ability to remain patient, calm, and professional while assisting highly frustrated or anxious end-users.

• Bachelor’s degree or higher in a relevant scientific or engineering discipline (e.
• 15+ years of progressive quality assurance leadership experience in Life Sciences, Diagnostics, or related industries, with proven success in consumables and instrumentation.
• Experience leading organizations through ISO9001 and ISO13485 certification.
• Exceptional leadership, organizational development, and communication skills, with a proven ability to influence across all levels of the business.
• , Molecular Biology, Analytical Chemistry, Chemical Engineering or related engineering discipline).
• Formal training and certification in Quality Assurance management (e.
• Demonstrated success in establishing and managing effective QMS and Document Control systems in high-growth, complex organizations.
• Deep understanding of Operations and R&D functions.

• Sales Management: Demonstrate funnel management skills with strong hunting/prospecting and closing skills.
• Customer Relationships: Establish trust with customers, understand their research needs and internal dynamics, and take a consultative selling approach to provide the right solutions.
• Team Coordination: Work effectively with sales and support teams, Collaboration: Work closely with other roles, aligning internal responsibilities and goals, and leveraging experts to drive customer decisions and an exceptional customer experience from awareness through adoption and utilization.
• Post-Purchase Support: Manage the customer relationship post-purchase to support ongoing consumables use and identify new and future research opportunities and needs.
• Market and Product Knowledge: Maintain current knowledge of genetic analysis markets, products, and buying practices required to effectively compete in the assigned territory.
• Bachelor’s degree in Biology, Molecular Biology, Biochemistry or related field.
• Or the equivalent knowledge and experience.
• Minimum of 2 years sales experience in Life Science, selling small to mid-sized capital and consumables, preferably in the academic, life sciences or biotechnology industries Extensive knowledge of single cell and spatial biology tools applied to life science research.

• BS / BA Degree in Finance or Accounting or equivalent experience (MBA is a plus).
• 6+ years of experience in Finance.
• Advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills required.
• Knowledge of US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) as well as internal controls/Sarbanes-Oxley requirements.
• Experience in data management and reporting, preferably supporting FP&A.
• Strong verbal and written communications skills required.
• Excellent analytical, problem solving, critical thinking, and organizational skills required.
• Experience in the biotech or pharmaceutical industry and multinational organization is a plus.

• Execute production operations according to defined procedures and ensure the integrity and quality of our products Ability to operate and maintain laboratory to clean room standards required in the production of Life Science products Process work orders accurately using an ERP system in a timely manner Maintenance of production batch records and good documentation under ISO requirement Accurate tracking of production data, test data and inventory Assembly of 10x consumables and finished goods both manually and using semi-automated packaging equipment Ability to set up and operate packaging and escalate issues to supervisor’s or MSE’s attention High school education / Associate Degree or above Strong team player and detail oriented Good communication skills Ability to read and understand SOPs and equipment user manual Ability to enter data into electronic tracking systems like Excel Ability to multi-task and prioritize work load to meet strict deadlines under supervision Good documentation skills and ability to write procedures and reports Desire to be part of a rapidly evolving organization and taking products and processes to the next level Ability to lift up to 15 pounds and potentially stand or sit for up to 3 hour increments Experience in automation and packaging of Life Science products, Food Packaging products or related field preferred Relevant experience in a production environment working with standard production control tools – ERP, inventory control, and work orders Experience training employees on production processes defined in production batch records and work instructions Experience writing and revising work instructions and production batch records Experienced in communicating and collaborating with production departments Histology
